summary: -Allows the player to gain more or less Carry Weight per Stamina picking.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================
= DFB - Carry Weight Per Stamina
==================================================================

Other Mod(s) you might like:
DFB Additional Health Per Level: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4790

==========
=Overview=
==========
-Allows the player to gain more or less Carry Weight per Stamina picking.

====================
= Current Settings =
====================
+ 0 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 1 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 2 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 3 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 4 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
- Default is 5.
+ 6 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 7 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 8 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 9 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 10 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 11 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 12 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 13 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 14 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 15 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 16 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 17 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 18 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 19 Carry Weight Per Stamina.
+ 20 Carry Weight Per Stamina.

==============
=Known Issues=
==============
+Does not apply Carry Weight to old saves. Only new levels.

=================
=Version History=
=================
=Version 1.0=
+Initial Release
author: Darkfirebird
